Featured Products

Focused formulations and support for urinary health and BPH management.

  • Fomause — Tamsulosin / Tamsulosin + Dutasteride

    Alpha‑blocker therapy for symptomatic relief of benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH). Available as capsule/tablet formulations via licensed manufacturing partners.

  • Cranberry + D‑Mannose

    Natural urinary tract support to help reduce the risk of recurring UTIs. Available in sachets and tablet formulations.

  • Nitrofurantoin

    Antibiotic for uncomplicated urinary tract infections. Short-course therapy for appropriate patients as per prescribing guidelines.
